title: Woman Bouncing Ball

nouns: A woman is a female human.
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.
An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.
An adult female person (as opposed to a man)

description: The female version of the ⛹ Person With Ball emoji.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's rendition of the woman bouncing a ball emoji showcases a dynamic figure in mid-action, with smooth, rounded edges and subtle 3D shading that suggests movement and energy. The woman's posture, caught in the joyful act of bouncing, is expertly conveyed with Apple's attention to realistic lighting, highlighting her athletic form and cheerful demeanor. This emoji, seen on Apple devices, embodies fun, activity, sports, and a sense of playful abandon.
